Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.10802050]HIV:Inhibition of HIV infection in NP-2/CD4/APJ cells(IC50=26.0 Î¼g/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: APJ receptor could help HIV virus enter the target cells. The peptide can bind with APJ receptor and block virus entry, thus inhibiting virus infection.

Literature.Title: Apelin peptides block the entry of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
Literature.Author: Zou MX, Liu HY, Haraguchi Y, Soda Y, Tatemoto K, Hoshino H.
